title: Noam Chomsky on Identity Politics and "Wokeness"
description:
As part of a larger interview with Noam Chomsky about the radicalism of the 1960s New Left, we finished with a discussion of the transformation of parts of the modern Left to focusing on I.D. politics and being "woke"


Full podcast interview at:   https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/g-r-episode-91-noam-chomsky-on-the-1960s-and-the-new-left/id1501708978?i=1000523751184
